definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: roll, roll away (NH id., & deriv.; Aram. Pa. [[גַּלֵּל]], Palp. [[גַּלְגֵּיל]] roll, Ithpalp. reflex., & deriv.; cf. gal Ethp., Ethpalp. (v. PS), gigal rota, gallo0 fluctus, etc.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[גַּלּוֹתִי]] Jos 5:9, [[וְגׇֽלֲלוּ]] consec. Ge 29:3, Ge 29:8; Imv. [[גּׁל]] Ps 22:9 (MT De; but LXX Bi Che rd. [[גַּל]] 3 ms. pf., so AV RVm) Pr 16:3, [[גּוֹל]] Ps 37:5, [[גַּל]] Ps 119:22 (but rd. [[גּׁל]] Ew Hi Ri Gr Che), [[גּׁלּוּ]] Jos 10:18, 1Sa 14:33; Pt. [[גּׁלֵל]] Pr 26:27; —roll a stone Pr 26:27; roll away stone from upon ([[מֵעַל]]) the mouth of a well Ge 29:3, Ge 29:8; roll stones unto ([[אֶל]]) the mouth of a cave Jos 10:18; stone unto ([[אֶל]]) Saul, at which to slay beasts 1Sa 14:33; fig. reproach from upon ([[מֵעַל]]) the people Jos 5:9 (subj. ´[[י]]), cf. Ps 119:22 (sq. [[מֵעַל]]); but also [[דַּרְכֶָּךָ]] ´[[גּוֹל עַל־י]] Ps 37:5, cf. Ps 22:9, Pr 16:3 (both sq. [[אֶל־]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנׇגׁלּוּ]] consec. Is 34:4; Impf. [[וְיִגַּל]] (juss.) Am 5:24; —roll, roll up or along (intrans.), [[וְנׇגׁלּוּ כַסֵּפֶר הַשָּׁמַיִם]] Is 34:4 and the heavens shall roll up like a book; [[יִגַּל כַּמַּיִם מִשְׁפָּט]] Am 5:24 let judgement roll along (flow down) as the waters.

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְגִלְגַּלְתִּיךָ]] consec. Je 51:25 and I will roll thee down from ([[מִן]]) the rocks (subj. ´[[י]]; obj. Babylon under fig. of mt.)

definitions.title: Pō‘al
definitions.body: Pt. [[שִׂמְלָה]] [[מְגוֹלָלָה בְדָמִים]] Is 9:4 garment rolled (dabbled, rolled over and over) in blood.

definitions.title: Hithpo.
definitions.body: Inf. [[לְהִתְגּׁלֵל]] Ge 43:8; Pt. [[מִתְגּׁלֵל]] 2Sa 20:12; rol oneself over and over, [[בַּדָּם]] ´[[וַעֲמָשָׂא מִתְג]] 2Sa 20:12 now Amasa was wallowing in his blood; fig. Ge 43:18 [[עָלֵינוּ]] ´[[לְהִתְג]] to roll himself upon us, i.e. assail us with overwhelming force (‖[[וּלְהִתְנַפֵּל]] [[עָלֵינוּ]]).

definitions.title: Hithpalp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִתְגַּלְגׇּ֑לוּ]] Job 30:14 (abs.; ‖[[כְּפֶרֶץ רָחָב יֶאֱתָָיוּ]]) cf. Hithpo. Ge 43:8.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיׇּ֫גֶל]] Ge 29:10; —roll away stone from upon ([[מֵעַל]]) mouth of well; as

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: (which it really is, Impf. in i, acc. to Ba:ZMG 1888, 178).
